title: Bug 7945 - Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945 - Search results not selected in external jar. Build 200201151. When searching for references to this field, the search results are not being selected correctly.
OB: When double-clicking on a search result, the first match is not being selected.
EB: When double-clicking on a search result, the corresponding match should be selected.
SR: 1. Open the external jar file 2. Perform a search for references to a specific field. 3. Double-click on any search result. Observe that the corresponding match is not selected.
